description: The REFERRAL table is the primary table for referral information stored in system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral in database. This is the primary key for the REFERRAL table.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID_NUM
columns.description: The external identification number used on the referral.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient associated with the referral.

columns.name: PCP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient's primary care provider at the time the referral was created.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the referral was entered.

columns.name: RFL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value representing the status of the referral (I.e. authorized, open, pending, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Open


Pending Review


Canceled


Denied


Closed


New Request


Incomplete

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral source (REF) record of the provider who made the referral. This column is frequently used to link to the REFERRAL_SOURCE table. The actual provider (SER) ID can be found in column REF_PROVIDER_ID of table REFERRAL_SOURCE.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the vendor associated with the referral.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: REFERRAL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider (SER) being referred to. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PROV_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the provider specialty being referred to.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RFL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the type of referral.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RSN_FOR_RFL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the main (first) reason for the referral.   Since multiple reasons can be listed, use table REFERRAL_REASONS to view all of them.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RFL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the class of the referral.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Internal


Incoming


Outgoing

columns.name: AUTH_VIS_PERIOD
columns.description: The number of authorized visits in each visit period.

columns.name: AUTH_PERIOD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the type of period for authorized visits - i.e. hour, day, week, month, year.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hour


Day


Week


Month


Year

columns.name: AUTH_NUM_PERIODS
columns.description: The number of periods authorized for this referral.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM_OF_VISITS
columns.description: The number of visits authorized for this referral.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DATE
columns.description: The admission date associated with the referral.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The discharge date associated with the referral.

columns.name: ESTIMATED_DAYS
columns.description: The authorized length of stay if the patient is being admitted.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the referral.

columns.name: EXP_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date of the referral.

columns.name: PEND_TO
columns.description: The person or pool to whom an In Basket message should be sent about this referral.

columns.name: PEND_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
For pended referrals, the category value indicating the reason for pending.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DENY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
For denied referrals, the category value indicating the reason for denial.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the service area associated with the referral.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage associated with the referral.

columns.name: NUM_PROC
columns.description: The number of procedures associated with the referral.

columns.name: SVC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: If available, this column is populated by the authorized start date (I RFL 85). If not, it is populated by the expiration date on the referral (I RFL 90). If neither of these are available, the column will be empty. The date in this column is based on days since December 31, 1840.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the carrier associated with the referral.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the payor associated with the referral.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: PLAN_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the plan associated with the referral.

columns.name: PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: SERV_DATE
columns.description: This column is populated by the authorized start date (I RFL 85) if available. If not, it is populated by the expiration date on the referral (I RFL 90). If neither of these are available, the column will be empty. The date in this column is in MM/DD/YYYY format.

columns.name: RETRO_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
The category value used to mark a referral as being "Retro" entered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IBNR
columns.description: The "Incurred but not reported" amount associated with this referral.

columns.name: AUTO_APPROVED_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the referral was approved automatically by the system.

columns.name: AUTH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the authorization reason associated with the referral.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFD_BY_LOC_POS_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the place of service the referral was referred from.

columns.name: REFD_TO_LOC_POS_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the place of service the referral was referred to.

columns.name: REFD_TO_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the department the referral was referred to.

columns.name: REFD_TO_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the specialty the department was referred to.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the priority of the referral.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Routine


Urgent


Emergency


Elective


Two Week Wait


See Details

columns.name: TOTAL_PRICE
columns.description: The total cost of the procedures authorized under the referral.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYABLE
columns.description: The portion of the total price for which your facility is responsible.

columns.name: PATIENT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total patient liability, under the parameters of the primary coverage used, for the procedures authorized under the referral.

columns.name: EXPECT_TO_PAY
columns.description: The total amount you expect your facility will pay for the procedures authorized under the referral. This amount entered by you overrides the total payable amount for the purpose of calculating IBNR.

columns.name: IBNR_PAY_UNTIL_DT
columns.description: The date up to which your facility will pay claims for the procedures approved on this referral.

columns.name: CASE_RATE_YN
columns.description:
The category value indicating whether this referral involves services that are reimbursed at a specific case rate.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PRIM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the member's primary location at the time the referral was entered.

columns.name: MED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating what type of confirmation it is - acute, chronic or PAT.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute


Chronic


PAT

columns.name: ACUTE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of the confirmation if the confirmation is acute.

columns.name: CHRONIC_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of the confirmation if the confirmation is chronic.

columns.name: PAT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of the confirmation if the confirmation is an acute medication that was suggested by the pharmacist or over-the-counter medication.

columns.name: RFL_LOB_ID
columns.description: ID of the Line of Business (LOB) assigned to the referral.

columns.name: RFL_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: ACTUAL_NUM_VISITS
columns.description: The actual number of completed visits for this referral.

columns.name: SCHED_NUM_VISITS
columns.description: The number of visits scheduled for this referral.

columns.name: REQUEST_NUM_VISITS
columns.description: The number of visits requested for this referral.

columns.name: GUIDELINE_DAYS
columns.description: Guideline days for this referral.

columns.name: OVRD_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: Override admit date for this referral.

columns.name: OVRD_DISCHARGE_DT
columns.description: Override discharge date for this referral.

columns.name: DISP_VAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the referral was accepted ("appointed") or refused ("denied") by the referred-to provider, department or facility.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Appointed


Denied

columns.name: DISP_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that a referral's disposition has a status of "denied."


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Forwarded to External


Forwarded to Internal

columns.name: DISP_EAF_ID
columns.description: The unique id of the facility to which the referral was forwarded.

columns.name: REFD_BY_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the department the referral was referred by.

columns.name: CLOSE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
For closed referrals, the category value indicating the reason for closing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SCHED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scheduling status of the referral to keep track of internally schedulable referrals.  For category list use ZC_SCHED_STATUS.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Do not change

columns.name: SCHED_BY_DATE
columns.description: Indicates deadline to schedule a referral.

columns.name: PREAUTH_REQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
For referrals created from an order, indicates if a preauthorization number must be collected before scheduling.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Prior Authorization Number Required


Prior Authorization Number Collected


Prior Authorization Number Not Collected


Prior Authorization Number Processed

columns.name: NOT_COLLCTD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason indicating why the preauth number will not be collected for this referral.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROCESSED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason indicating why the preauth number is marked as processed for this referral.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PREAUTH_CHG_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who last changed the preauthorization data.

columns.name: PREAUTH_CHNGD_DTTM
columns.description: Date/time stamp for last time the preauthorization data was changed.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Authorization number.

columns.name: PRE_CERT_NUM
columns.description: Pre-certification number.

columns.name: NON_PREF_PROV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why a non preferred level provider was chosen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXT_REF_DATE
columns.description: This is the external referring date.

columns.name: EOW_ID
columns.description: The unique EOW ID associated with the referral.

columns.name: REQ_VIS_PER_PERIOD
columns.description: The requested visits per period on the referral.

columns.name: REQ_PERIOD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The requested period type on the referral.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AUTH_PERIOD_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: REQ_NUM_OF_PERIODS
columns.description: The requested number of periods on the referral.

columns.name: REF_TO_PROV_ADDR_ID
columns.description: This stores the address ID of the referred to provider. The format is as follows: ProvID-AddressID. AddressID is the line number of the multiple response address items in the SER masterfile. To use this column, join to CLARITY_SER_ADDR on REFERRAL.REF_TO_PROV_ADDR_ID = CLARITY_SER_ADDR.ADDR_UNIQUE_ID. If you use IntraConnect, also join on REFERRAL.REFERRAL_PROV_ID = CLARITY_SER_ADDR.PROV_ID.

columns.name: DECISION_DATE
columns.description: Date on which the referral's current status was assigned.

columns.name: NUM_CLMS_EXPECTED
columns.description: Number of claims expected to be filed on this referral.

columns.name: RFL_STATCHG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category number describing why the referral status was changed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Canceled Order


TPL Created


Order Added


Order Modified


Order Deleted


Build Change


Coverage Change


Treatment Department Change


Diagnosis Change


Create AUTs for new coverage

columns.name: TOTAL_CONVTD_DAYS
columns.description: The total number of converted days on the referral.

columns.name: AMT_CLMS_PAID
columns.description: The amount of claims paid.

columns.name: ADJ_VENDOR_ID

columns.name: ADJ_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: ADJ_MEMBER_GROUP_ID

columns.name: ADJ_MEMBER_GROUP_ID_MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.description:
Adjudication network status.

 Category Entries: 


IN NETWORK


OUT OF NETWORK


N/A

columns.description: The number of claims paid on the claim.
